text: You don't have to worry about whether the car is set up right or not, you know it is, and it's down to you. Ultimately, that's what every driver wants.
author: Bobby Rahal

text: They think they can make fuel from horse manure - now, I don't know if your car will be able to get 30 miles to the gallon, but it's sure gonna put a stop to siphoning.
author: Billie Holiday

text: I take cabs if I need to get somewhere or I take car service. I don't drive, I wouldn't mind riding a bike... People think that because you become an entertainer you gotta have this rock star thug image. I'm an artist, man. I'm going to live like an artist.
author: ASAP Rocky

text: In New York, you've got Donald Trump, Woody Allen, a crack addict and a regular Joe, and they're all on the same subway car.
author: Ethan Hawke

text: It wasn't a secret that I was gay. I'd come out to my parents during my junior year of high school, on the day that I also wrecked the family car.
author: Mary Cheney

text: Parking is a nightmare for me... I still have sensors on my car that help me park.
author: Jordana Brewster

text: When I was really little I would sit in the back of my dad's car when he'd be playing old-school music. He'd turn down the music and turn around and I'd be singing and know all of the words but I didn't even know how to talk. From then on I've always wanted to be a singer.
author: Leona Lewis

text: I'm ashamed to say this, but I watched every episode of 'Starsky and Hutch' as a kid. I loved that show, but now I think it's stupid - they'd have a car chase for no reason, then Paul Michael Glaser would shoot the car and it would blow up.
author: Shane Black

text: I love singin' in the car, it just makes me feel good.
author: Scotty McCreery

text: The city needs a car like a fish needs a bicycle.
author: Dean Kamen

text: You always hear the phrase, money doesn't buy you happiness. But I always in the back of my mind figured a lot of money will buy you a little bit of happiness. But it's not really true. I got a new car because the old one's lease expired.
author: Sergey Brin

text: I'm sort of like a lame, single guy in a red sports car.
author: Billy Corgan

text: So there is going to be that balance of understanding how to get the best out of the car that day, whether it's 15th or even if I have a shot at a top 10, protecting that car so we can bring it back when we have to.
author: Kurt Busch

text: Someday we'll look back on this moment and plow into a parked car.
author: Evan Davis

text: ER was one of my favourites. I played a car accident victim who has leukemia. I got to wear a neck brace and nose tubes for the two days I worked.
author: Dakota Fanning

text: Investors have few spare tires left. Think of the image of a car on a bumpy road to an uncertain destination that has already used up its spare tire. The cash reserves of people have been eaten up by the recent market volatility.
author: Mohamed El-Erian

text: Auto racing is boring except when a car is going at least 172 miles per hour upside down.
author: Dave Barry

text: I've worked as a labourer, driven taxis and school buses, and been a car mechanic - whatever I could do just to get by. But it does mean that I know a little bit about a lot of things.
author: Cory Monteith

text: Is it sufficient that you have learned to drive the car, or shall we look and see what is under the hood? Most people go through life without ever knowing.
author: June Singer

text: If you are a writer you locate yourself behind a wall of silence and no matter what you are doing, driving a car or walking or doing housework you can still be writing, because you have that space.
author: Joyce Carol Oates

text: I think a lot of writers, male and female, write as if their parents were killed in a car accident when they were 2, and they have no one to hold accountable. And unfortunately, I don't have that. I have parents who I care about what they think.
author: Mindy Kaling

text: We should tell our kids to just have fun, participate and not get bent on winning or losing. But every coach, when they say that, they say it tongue in cheek, 'Don't worry about winning': If you win I'll get you ice cream, but if you lose I'm going to pout in the car.
author: Bode Miller

text: Well, you go to Holland and everybody's on a bike - nobody would think to have a car.
author: Stone Gossard

text: I enjoy racing historic motorcars from the '50s and '60s. The seed of my interest was planted when I was about 12 years old and took over my mother's Morris Minor. I drove it around my father's farm. But my favorite car is still a McLaren F1, which I have had for 10 years.
author: Rowan Atkinson

text: But I also like to shower my parents with presents. I bought them a beautiful car and a house.
author: Eva Herzigova
